english.segment1: If You came by me would I crown You my King. Or brush You off as though I really didnt see. If You walked by my side would our souls then be unified. I swore Your name would never be denied
english.segment2: But I took up this hammer. And laughed at all Your slander. And pierced Your hands. With the nails of blasphemy. How could I do this? I dont know. Said something forced me to it, so. Spit in Your face and passed You by. (Id forgotten those words "your name wont be denied")
english.segment3: But time and time again Id live that life of sin. I knew it hurt you bad but I wasnt ready to give in. "Maybe someday," but not this day I said. I wanted to live my life I was willing to pay the price
english.segment5: But looking into my eyes I knew You felt this hearts cry. I needed You bad my life was oh so sad. But looking back at all this pain, this guilt, this strife. Would You take it all away if I were to give you back my life?
english.segment6: But You said "Ive forgiven thee". And You said "Ive forgiven thee" (repeat)
english.segment7: He was hanging on a cross. With a crown of thorns in His head (repeat)
english.segment8: But You said "Ive forgiven thee". And You said "Ive forgiven thee" (repeat)
